parametrized_description: A shipping company transports packages using trucks and cars. Each truck transports TruckCapacity packages per trip and uses TruckGas liters of gas per trip. Each car transports CarCapacity packages per trip and uses CarGas liters of gas per trip. The number of truck trips is limited by MaxTruckTrips. At least MinCarTripPercentage of all trips must be made by car. The company needs to transport at least MinTotalPackages packages. The objective is to minimize the total gas consumed.

TruckCapacity.description: Number of packages a truck can transport per trip

CarCapacity.description: Number of packages a car can transport per trip

TruckGas.description: Liters of gas a truck uses per trip

CarGas.description: Liters of gas a car uses per trip

MaxTruckTrips.description: Maximum number of truck trips allowed

MinCarTripPercentage.description: Minimum percentage of trips that must be made by car

MinTotalPackages.description: Minimum number of packages to transport

constraints.description: The number of truck trips cannot exceed MaxTruckTrips.
At least MinCarTripPercentage of all trips must be made by car.
At least MinTotalPackages packages must be transported.

objective.description: Total gas consumed is the sum of gas used by trucks and cars per trip. The objective is to minimize the total gas consumed.
